channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- BigFix ServiceNow Data Flow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- BigFix ServiceNow Data Flow

item.title: CVE-2023-37518|2024-08-02T17:16:30.471Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20servicenow%20data%20flow
item.description: HCL BigFix ServiceNow is vulnerable to arbitrary code injection. A malicious authorized attacker could inject arbitrary code and execute within the context of the running user.
